https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iNH1ZnOChqxmdxeSNytUObFRCS3.jpg As music sweeps the room, the strength and passion of the inhabitants of a retirement house rise! Singers and dancers all intermingle in stories involving cards, wheelchairs, knits, and romantic love. A Golden Age
